message: I'm trying to really get into song production at the moment, and I'd love to have some old tunes to sample from. Is there any site with (fairly high quality) jazz/blues/soul/anything from the past  really?

thats a tough one. im not in anyway producing, but i love to discover old music and i came to find the only way is to go to any record store in your area. SF, NYC, are great and I kinda save in order to make trips. If you find one let us know.
